package.name: v4r_artoolkitplus
package.description: The v4r_artoolkitplus package is a wrapper around the ARToolKitPlus software library for ROS. The ARToolKitPlus is a extended version of ARToolKit's library with a class-based API but with no VRML and camera library. It is also optimized to work with a set of precoded marker, so no marker training is needed. The ARToolKitPlus library was published under GPL2, thanks for that work goes to all people listed in a ./3rdParty/ARToolKitPlus/THANKS. More details about ARToolKitPlus package can be found under http://studierstube.org/handheld_ar/artoolkitplus.php
package.author: Markus Bader
